items.reviewContent:
i ordered and paid for this product on 16th June, 2022 and as per commitment it has to be delivered by 24-25th June but the order was not processed nor shipped till I continuously reminded them in a wry appropriate way that they need to deliver. meanwhile dawlence miscommunicated twice or thrice order has been processed and shipped. after alot of struggle and behaving in their attitude I got the order yesterday i.e. 1st July, 2022 and as everyone can see it's scratched and has small dips/dents both at start of scratch and at the end. such a pathetic experience with daraz and dawlence. daraz guys helped somehow but dawlence has the worst customer services. I have dropped a complaint at daraz and ets see how long will it take. dawlence gives a damn to what customer goes through. 
P.S:  I just noted that despite paying for inverter/advante + dawlence has given me regular freezer. these people are cheat.
this has already been reported by another customer in review.
